param.name: Required password type
param.description: Password needs to contain at least one character from selected type, e.g. for 'Alphanumerics - letters and numerics' type: at least 1 letter and 1 digit. PIN available from KNOX 2.0 or higher.
param.value: Zlozone - litery, cyfry oraz znaki specjalne

param.name: Minimum password length
param.description: Minimum length for lockcode value. Password/PIN code length 4-16 chars.  For KNOX 1.X password/PIN code length 6-16 chars.

param.name: Possibility to preview password while entering
param.description: Option enables displaying password while entering KNOX container.

param.name: Minimum number of complex characters
param.description: Number of sign 1-4. If equals 1, at least one digit is required. If greater than 1, at least one digit and at least one symbol are required.

param.name: Maximum number of the same character
param.description: Any character cannot occur more than the specified maximum number of times, e.g. '3' for 'a' in 'aaabcde'

param.name: Maximum character sequence length
param.description: Password must not contain alphabetic sequences greater than given lenght, e.g. '3' for 'abc' or 'zyx', 0 for no restriction

param.name: Maximum number sequence length
param.description: Password must not contain numeric sequences greater than given lenght, e.g. '3' for '123' or '987', 0 for no restriction

param.name: Minimum number of changed characters
param.description: Minimum number of changed characters that the new password string should have in comparison to the new one, 0 for no restrictions.

param.name: Disallowed strings
param.description: Strings that cannot be used in lock code, e.g. test, password

param.name: Lock code expiration
param.description: Time in days when the lock code expires (0 - 365)

param.name: Passcode history
param.description: The number of unique passcodes required before reuse (1-50 or 0 for none)

param.name: Maximum failed attempts
param.description: Maximum failed attempts before Knox lock. Amount of attempts  1-10.

param.name: Allow Samsung Gear to extend KNOX autolock value
param.description: Allow Samsung Gear to extend KNOX password autolock to 2 hours

param.name: Allow fingerprint
param.description: 'Fingerprint' value is supported only by devices with fingerprint reader.
